Name: AAYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter aayanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ා.

Name: TAALUJA SHAYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter taaluja shayanna". Part of the extended (miśra) repertoire (for Sanskrit, Pali, etc).

Name: MAHAPRAANA DHAYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter mahapraana dhayanna". Part of the extended (miśra) repertoire (for Sanskrit, Pali, etc).

Name: UYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter uyanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ු.

Name: IYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter iyanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ි.

Name: KAEYANNAA
Description: "Sinhala letter kaeyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with keti aeda-pilla).

Name: KAAEYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter kaaeyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with diga aeda-pilla).

Name: KIYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter kiyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with keti is-pilla).

Name: KIIYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter kiiyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with diga is-pilla).

Name: KUYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter kuyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with keti paa-pilla).

Name: KOYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter koyanna" (alpapraana kayanna with kombuwa and aela-pilla).

Name: EYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter eyanna". The corresponding dependent vowel is  ෙ.

Name: DANTAJA NAYANNA
Description: "Sinhala letter dantaja nayanna". Part of the extended (miśra) repertoire (for Sanskrit, Pali, etc).
